content: secure ends stitch count 12 x 5 treble_crochet bobbles 36dc bobbles 36dc join in any st ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 1dc into each of the next 47sts join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 48 double_crochet 7 ch3 this counts as the 1st double_crochet and ch1 *skip st 1dc into the next st ch1 * repeat from *to* 22 more times join to the 2nd chain of beginning ch3 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 24dc 24 ch1-spaces ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet work 1 double_crochet into each st and ch1-space join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 48 double_crochet ch1 t his does not count as a st 1sc into the same st work 1sc into each of the next 47sts join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 48 single_crochet now embellish your twiddle muff you can attach buttons ribbon and accessories go crazy 😊 8 for more visit us on ravelry com/designers/hooked-on-sunshine etsy com/shop/hookedonsunshineza hookedonsunshine co/youtube com instagram com/hooked_on_sunshine/ facebook com/groups/1370975902929963 hookedonsunshine co you can get assistance in our facebook group with pattern questions for billing or other issues you can email queries to hosteam@hookedonsunshine co keep ing you hooked until next time 9
